# Nutrition Label Maker

Nutrition Label Maker is a comprehensive platform for generating nutrition labels, barcodes, and managing recipes. We provide tools for individuals and businesses to create compliant and informative labels for their food products.

## Key Features:
- Nutrition Label Generator: Create FDA-compliant nutrition fact labels for your recipes.
- Barcode Generator: Generate various types of barcodes for your products.
- Ingredient Builder: Manage and customize your ingredients for accurate labeling.
- Recipe Management: Save and organize your recipes in one place.

- [/ingredient-builder](https://nutrition-label-maker.vercel.app/ingredient-builder) - Access the Ingredient Builder.
